name: double-ratchet
description: A  (failed) TypeScript implementation of the Signal Double Ratchet protocol with modern cryptographic primitives (X25519, Ed25519, AES-GCM, SHA-512).

scripts.rebuild: npm run clear && npm run build
scripts.prepub: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.postpub: git push && git push --tags origin master
scripts.prepub:next: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.pub:next: npm version prerelease --preid=next && npm publish --tag next
scripts.sync: git ac && git pull --rebase && git push

author: @suyeonORG, @ChaosArnhug, @KTBASECURITY, @Draimy
